column4: well I guess GOOD ole ---> sudo chmod -x /etc/init.d/service_name
lol
we need a nice Minimual X install for this Ubuntu
you could debfoster ubuntu-desktop.. adn then install X
sorry what?
what ya mean debfoster ubuntu-desktop ?
if you use debfoster you can remove ubuntu-desktop (which will leave you with just a base)
ok I installed it but I dont see any ubuntu-desktop that came up in it
how would you run debfoster, just type it is all then remove the ones you find is all?
just run debfoster and then tell it to prune ubuntu-desktop
just run debfoster, and then remove ubuntu-desktop
how much stuff is in ubuntu-desktop?
pretty much evertyhing except the base
lol true
you'll end up with like a default debian install
all of it
oh I dont need to do that I just want to get rid of stuff like Raid, ssh, LVM, apm, atd, etc...
I'll just go through Synaptic and pick through it
okay
oh btw ubuntu-desktop isnt installed on my box I just saw it in Synaptic as not installed
hmm.. interesting.. you must have removed something from it
hmm I did remove some of apci and the apmd stuff
